00051 #include <cctype>
00052 
00053 #include <trex/utils/TREXversion.hh>
00054 #include <trex/agent/Agent.hh>
00055 #include <trex/agent/StepClock.hh>
00056 
00057 using namespace TREX::agent;
00058 using namespace TREX::utils;
00059 using namespace TREX::transaction;
00060 namespace xml = boost::property_tree::xml_parser;
00061 
00062 namespace {
00064   SingletonUse<LogManager> s_log;
00065 
00072   void printHelp() {
00073     std::cout<<"Options:\n"
00074             <<"  Q :- quit\n"
00075             <<"  N :- next tick\n"
00076             <<"  G :- goto tick (e.g. g100)\n"
00077             <<"  P :- post the goals from the attached file\n"
00078             <<"       (e.g P goal.req)\n"
00079             <<"  K :- kill one reactor (e.g K foo)\n"      
00080             // <<"  W :- wrap the agent to tick 0\n"
00081             <<"  H :- print this help message"
00082             <<std::endl;
00083   }
00084 
00108   bool parseGoals(Agent &trex, std::string const &name) {
00109     bool found;
00110     std::string file = s_log->locate(name, found).string();
00111 
00112     if( !found ) {
00113       // try to add the .req extension
00114       file = s_log->use(name+".req", found);
00115     } else {
00116       s_log->use(file, found);
00117     }
00118 
00119     if( !found ) {
00120       std::cerr<<"Unable to locate file \""<<name<<"\""<<std::endl;
00121       s_log->syslog("WARN")<<"Unable to find request file \""<<name<<'\"';
00122       return false;
00123     } else {
00124       try {
00125        std::cout<<"Loading \""<<file<<"\"... "<<std::flush;
00126        boost::property_tree::ptree config;
00127 
00128        s_log->syslog("INFO")<<"Loading request file \""<<name<<'\"';
00129        read_xml(file, config, xml::no_comments|xml::trim_whitespace);
00130        
00131        if( config.empty() )
00132          std::cout<<"empty file"<<std::endl;
00133        else {
00134          std::cout<<"done\nExtracting goals:"<<std::endl;
00135          if( config.size()==1 && !is_tag(config.front(), "Goal") )
00136            config = config.front().second;
00137          trex.sendRequests(config);
00138        }
00139        return true;
00140       } catch(Exception const &te) {
00141        s_log->syslog("ERROR")<<"TREX error while loading \""<<name<<"\": "<<te;
00142        std::cerr<<"TREX error "<<te<<std::endl;
00143       } catch( std::exception const &e ) {
00144        s_log->syslog("ERROR")<<"Exception while loading \""<<name<<"\": "<<e.what();
00145        std::cerr<<"exception: "<<e.what()<<std::endl;
00146       } catch(...) {
00147        s_log->syslog("ERROR")<<"Unknwon exception while loading \""<<name<<"\"";
00148        std::cerr<<"Unknown error"<<std::endl;
00149       }
00150       return false;
00151     }
00152   }
00153 }
00154 
00194 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00195   std::cout<<"This is TREX v"<<TREX::version::str()<<std::endl;
00196 
00197   if( argc<2 || argc>4 ) {
00198     std::cerr << "Invalid argument list:"
00199              <<"\n Usage: "<<argv[0]<<" configFile [steps]"
00200              << std::endl;
00201     return -1;
00202   }
00203   char *configFile = argv[1];
00204   std::auto_ptr<Clock> clk;
00205 
00206   if( argc>=3 )
00207     clk.reset(new StepClock(0, string_cast<size_t>(argv[2])));
00208   Agent agent(configFile, clk.release());
00209   agent.setClock(new StepClock(0, 60));
00210   agent.initComplete();
00211   printHelp();
00212   while( true ) {
00213     if( agent.missionCompleted() ) {
00214       std::cout<<"Mission completed."<<std::endl;
00215       s_log->syslog("INFO")<<"Mission completed.";
00216       break;
00217     }
00218     TICK tick = agent.getCurrentTick();
00219     std::cout<<'['<<agent.getName()<<':'<<tick<<"]> ";
00220     std::string cmdString;
00221     std::cin>>cmdString;
00222 
00223     char const cmd = std::toupper(cmdString[0]);
00224     try {
00225       if( 'Q'==cmd ) {
00226        std::cout<<"Goodbye"<<std::endl;
00227        s_log->syslog("INFO")<<"User requested exit.";
00228        break;
00229       } else if( 'N'==cmd ) {
00230        while( agent.getCurrentTick()==tick && !agent.missionCompleted() )
00231          agent.doNext();
00232       } else if( 'G'==cmd ) {
00233        try {
00234          TICK targetTick = string_cast<TICK>(cmdString.substr(1));
00235          
00236          if( targetTick<=tick ) 
00237            std::cout<<"Tick "<<targetTick<<" is in the past."
00238                    // <<"\nYou can use W to wrap the agent to its initial tick."
00239                    <<std::endl;
00240          else {
00241            while( agent.getCurrentTick()<targetTick &&
00242                  !agent.missionCompleted() )
00243              agent.doNext();
00244          }  
00245        }catch(bad_string_cast const &e) {
00246          std::cout<<"Ill-formed g command"<<std::endl;
00247        }
00248       } else if( 'P'==cmd ) {
00249        std::string file;
00250        std::cin>>file;
00251        while( !file.empty() && std::isspace(file[0]) )
00252          file = file.substr(1);
00253        if( file.empty() ) {
00254          std::cerr<<"Missing file name"<<std::endl;
00255          printHelp();
00256        } else if( !parseGoals(agent, file) ) 
00257          printHelp();
00258       } else if( 'K'==cmd ) {
00259        std::string name;
00260        std::cin>>name;
00261        while( !name.empty() && std::isspace(name[0]) )
00262          name = name.substr(1);
00263        if( name.empty() ) {
00264          std::cerr<<"Missing reactor name"<<std::endl;
00265          printHelp();
00266        } else {
00267          Agent::reactor_iterator pos = agent.find_reactor(name);
00268          if( agent.reactor_end()==pos ) 
00269            std::cerr<<"Reactor \""<<name<<"\" not found."<<std::endl;
00270          else {
00271            agent.kill_reactor(*pos);
00272            std::cout<<"Reactor \""<<name<<"\" killed."<<std::endl;
00273          }
00274        }
00275       } else 
00276        printHelp();
00277     } catch( std::exception const & e) {
00278       std::cout<<"Caught an exception :"<<e.what()<<std::endl;
00279       break;
00280     } catch( ... ) {
00281       std::cout<<"Caught an unknown exception"<<std::endl;
00282       break;
00283     }
00284   }
00285   s_log->syslog("INFO")<<"=============================== END sim ============================";
00286   return 0;
00287 }
